name: Custom + Clean 123movies
description:
Customizable and cleaner 0123Movies.com

Features:
Cleaner and better design
Easily customizable
Also applies Disqus (comment section(optional))
Applies to video players (optional)
Mobile Support
Vibrant Video for a better movie watching experience

Check out my other styles:
https://userstyles.org/users/812884

I have a Discord channel for easier feedback and discussions about the styles: https://discord.gg/Emv2rtk

Theme by Zhou Yahui

user.name: Zhou Yahui
user.about:
Hi, I'm Zhou.

I make CSS themes I guess.
